title: Will DC smell like poop for America's 250th? Trump is 'worried.'
shortDescription: President Trump is concerned a raw sewage spill in the Potomac River could muck up plans for the country's 250th birthday this summer.

title: Trump touring steel plant in Rome, Georgia on Thursday. What to know
shortDescription: President Donald Trump is touring a steel plant in Rome, Georgia on Thursday as part of a series of events ramping up to the midterm primaries.

title: 'People's State of the Union.' What Democrats plan for Trump's speech
shortDescription: Some Democrats are planning a counterprotest at the same time as President Trump's State of the Union address.

title: Trump is losing support on immigration. What is his approval rating?
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has seen historically low approval ratings. Immigration has been among his best issues, but support for that has slipped too.

title: Republican congressman faces calls to resign over anti-Muslim 'dogs' post
shortDescription: Rep. Randy Fine, R-Fla., is drawing swift condemnation over anti-Muslim comments. It's not the first time.

title: Photos show Trump's Air Force One new paint colors
shortDescription: Photos of a model airplane show proposed updates to Air Force one featuring red, white, blue and gold in a break from the Kennedy-era paint scheme.

title: Trump Accounts for kids under 10 could still get funding. What to know
shortDescription: The Trump Accounts for kids will receive a $1,000 investment if the child is born between 2025 and 2028. But older kids can have accounts too.

title: In Trump’s America, greenhouse gas emitters can go crazy | The Excerpt
shortDescription: The repeal of the landmark EPA climate finding means that greenhouse gases, the primary cause of global warming, will go unregulated in the U.S.

title: New paint scheme for Trump's Air Force One: gold, red, white and blue
shortDescription: The Air Force is rolling out a new color palette across its executive airlift fleet, including the next-generation Air Force One aircraft.

title: Trump's big State of the Union speech: What to know.
shortDescription: The president is set to deliver the State of the Union address later this month. Find out when and where to watch his speech to Congress.

title: Trump trademarks his name as Florida prepares airport renaming
shortDescription: The president has a long history of naming things for himself.

title: Man who allegedly ran toward US Capitol with loaded shotgun arrested
shortDescription: A man who was allegedly seen running toward the U.S. Capitol with a shotgun was arrested, police said.

title: Kilmar Abrego Garcia can't be re-detained by Trump admin, judge rules
shortDescription: U.S. Judge Paula Xinis said the government "made one empty threat after another" to deport Kilmar Abrego Garcia to Africa.

title: Trump rally coming to Marjorie Taylor Greene's district. When and where
shortDescription: President Trump will hold a rally in Rome, Georgia amid the race to replace former Congresswoman Marjorie Taylor Greene in the 14th district.

title: Meet Kurt Olsen, election denier now leading U.S. election security
shortDescription: Kurt Olsen spread false claims about President Donald Trump's 2020 loss for years. Critics are asking why he's now in charge of midterm security.

title: Hillary Clinton accuses Trump of Epstein cover-up
shortDescription: Hillary Clinton and her husband, former President Bill Clinton, are set to testify before the house in closed-door depositions later this month.

title: Did Jesse Jackson like Donald Trump? They once collaborated
shortDescription: President Donald Trump offered his condolences to the family of Rev. Jesse Jackson, who died on Feb. 17. The two men collaborated in the 1990s.

title: A low Trump approval rating but huge war chest as midterms near
shortDescription: Although low inflation and unemployment are both bright spots in the economy, voters aren’t feeling it. That could hurt Republicans in the midterms.

title: Protests planned in SoCal call for Trump impeachment. Where, when
shortDescription: The demonstrations with public addresses are planned in Santa Clara, Los Angeles, Ontario, Corona and Chula Vista. What is happening?

title: 'Personality, grit and street smarts'. Trump says he knew Jesse Jackson well
shortDescription: Trump said a lot of his policy initiatives focusing on Black Americans were inspired by Jackson’s advocacy, such as funding HBCUs.
